Question
========
Below you can see a matrix with the correlation between rgmlife and
rgmfam. Rgmlife = reading lifestyle magazines, such as Cosmopolitan.
Rmgfam = reading family magazines, such as Panorama.  
  
<img src="1598532290271.png" class="fr-fic fr-dii tvcss_2"
alt="1598532290271" />  
Using the data in the above correlation matrix, calculate the
correlation between rmglife and rmgfam.

Answerlist
----------
* 0.006
* 0.431
* 1.444
* .093

Solution
========





= .006 /((sqrt(.062))\*(sqrt(.067))) = .093
